title: "Cyborg Line Art"
content:
# Cyborg Line Art

Welcome to Cyborg Line Art, a website featuring a minimalist wallpaper with a single line drawing of a cyborg in a striking color. Our website is dedicated to showcasing this unique and eye-catching wallpaper, perfect for anyone who appreciates simplicity and modern design.

Our wallpaper is available for download in various resolutions, making it easy to use as a background on your desktop or mobile device. The single line drawing of the cyborg creates a sleek and futuristic look that is sure to impress.

Whether you're a fan of science fiction, technology, or simply appreciate beautiful design, our Cyborg Line Art wallpaper is sure to catch your eye. Download it today and add a touch of minimalism and sophistication to your digital devices.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A minimalist wallpaper with a single line drawing of a cyborg, in a striking color such as bright red or blue."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
